quote: The universe is big. It’s vast and complicated and ridiculous. And sometimes, very rarely, impossible things just happen and we call them miracles
name: The 11th Doctor

quote: You want weapons? We’re in a library! Books! The best weapons in the world!
name: The 10th Doctor

quote: Amy Pond, there’s something you’d better understand about me ‘cause it’s important, and one day your life may depend on it: I am definitely a mad man with a box!
name: The 11th Doctor

quote: When you’re a kid, they tell you it’s all… Grow up, get a job, get married, get a house, have a kid, and that’s it. But the truth is, the world is so much stranger than that. It’s so much darker. And so much madder. And so much better.
name: Elton Pope

quote: The way I see it, every life is a pile of good things and bad things. The good things don’t always soften the bad things, but vice versa, the bad things don’t always spoil the good things and make them unimportant.
name: The 11th Doctor

quote: Some people live more in 20 years than others do in 80. It’s not the time that matters, it’s the person.
name: The 10th Doctor

quote: Do what I do. Hold tight and pretend it’s a plan!
name: The 11th Doctor
eName: The Doctor, the Widow and the Wardrobe

quote: In 900 years of time and space, I’ve never met anyone who wasn’t important.
name: The 11th Doctor

quote: 900 years of time and space, and I’ve never been slapped by someone’s mother.
name: The 9th Doctor

quote: Never ignore coincidence. Unless, of course, you’re busy. In which case, always ignore coincidence.
name: The 11th Doctor

quote: There’s a lot of things you need to get across this universe. Warp drive… wormhole refractors… You know the thing you need most of all? You need a hand to hold.
name: The 11th Doctor

quote: This is who I am, right here, right now, all right? All that counts is here and now, and this is me!
name: The 9th Doctor

quote: I am and always will be the optimist. The hoper of far-flung hopes and the dreamer of improbable dreams.
name: The 11th Doctor

quote: Everybody knows that everybody dies. But not every day. Not today. Some days are special. Some days are so, so blessed. Some days, nobody dies at all. Now and then, every once in a very long while, every day in a million days, when the wind stands fair and the Doctor comes to call, everybody lives.
name: River Song

quote: We’re all stories, in the end. Just make it a good one, eh?
name: The 11th Doctor

quote: Letting it get to you. You know what that’s called? Being alive. Best thing there is. Being alive right now is all that counts.
name: The 11th Doctor

quote: Always take a banana to a party, Rose: bananas are good!
name: The 10th Doctor

quote: You don’t just give up. You don’t just let things happen. You make a stand! You say no! You have the guts to do what’s right, even when everyone else just runs away
name: Rose Tyler

quote: This is one corner… of one country, in one continent, on one planet that’s a corner of a galaxy that’s a corner of a universe that is forever growing and shrinking and creating and destroying and never remaining the same for a single millisecond. And there is so much, so much to see.
name: The 11th Doctor

quote: Rose, before I go, I just want to tell you: you were fantastic. Absolutely fantastic. And you know what? So was I.
name: The 9th Doctor

quote: People assume that time is a strict progression of cause to effect, but *actually* from a non-linear, non-subjective viewpoint - it's more like a big ball of wibbly wobbly... time-y wimey... stuff.
name: The 10th Doctor

quote: We're all stories, in the end. Just make it a good one, eh?
name: The 11th Doctor

quote: The universe is big, its vast and complicated, and ridiculous. And sometimes, very rarely, impossible things just happen and we call them miracles. And that's the theory. Nine hundred years, never seen one yet, but this would do me.
name: The 11th Doctor

quote: Don't blink. Don't even blink. Blink and you're dead. Don't turn your back. Don't look away. And don't blink.
name: The 10th Doctor

quote: You don’t just give up. You don’t just let things happen. You make a stand! You say no! You have the guts to do what’s right, even when everyone else just runs away.
name: Rose Tyler

quote: If you step on a butterfly, you change the future of the human race.
name: Martha Jones

quote: Sometimes the only choices you have are bad ones, but you still have to choose.
name: The 12th Doctor

quote: Never trust a Hug, It's just a way to hide your face…
name: The 12th Doctor

quote: Without the Capcity for Pain, we can't feel the hurt we inflict.
name: The 12th Doctor

quote: You know what Thinking is? It's just a fancy word for changing your mind.
name: The 12th Doctor

quote: Do you know how you make someone into a Dalek? Subtract love, add anger.
name: Clara Oswald

quote: Still hungry? Well, I brought something for you. This - the most important leaf in human history. ... Full of history. ... This leaf isn't just the past, it's a whole future that never happened. There are billions and millions of unlived days for every day that we live; an infinity!
name: Clara Oswald
